title: Epic: Implement CLI v4 Output Design
description: Implement the v4 CLI output design with animated spinners, Nx-style summaries, box-drawing for parallel tasks, and standardized verbose logging. See docs/CLI_DESIGN_V4.md for full spec.

title: Add v4 symbols to color.zig
description: Add new symbols constant: ◉ (watching), ⟳ (changed), ○ (pending), — (skipped), ▷ (mode indicator), ? (prompt). Add spinner frames array. Update Theme with new symbol accessors.

title: Update error message formatting
description: Standardize error output: 'error:' in red, suggestions indented with 'did you mean:', hints with 'hint:' in blue. Parse errors use box-drawing (┌──, │). No-Jakefile error shows {j} logo.

title: Update confirmation prompt format
description: Use ? symbol in yellow for prompts. Format: '? Message here? [y/N]'. With --yes: 'auto-confirmed: Message here?'

title: Implement verbose logging with jake: prefix
description: Add verboseLog() helper function. All verbose output uses 'jake:' prefix in muted color. Implement verbose logging for: imports, .env loading, directory changes, variable expansion, glob patterns, cache operations, dependency resolution, hooks, validation, conditions. See docs/VERBOSE-LOCATIONS.md for full list.

title: Update version output with {j} logo
description: Modify main.zig to output '{j} jake 0.x.x' format for --version. Logo in Jake Rose color, version in muted gray.

title: Update help output with {j} logo
description: Modify args.zig printHelp() to show '{j} jake — modern command runner' header. Update examples section format per v4 spec.

title: Implement animated spinners for task execution
description: Add spinner animation during task execution in executor.zig. Use braille spinner frames (⠋⠙⠹...). Spinner shows during execution, replaced by ✓/✗ on completion. Requires terminal cursor manipulation.

title: Add Nx-style execution summary
description: After task execution, print summary: individual task timings, 'Successfully ran N tasks' (or 'Failed to run N task'), total time. Include [N cached] count if applicable. Modify executor.zig execute() to track and print summary.

title: Implement box-drawing for parallel execution
description: In parallel.zig, wrap concurrent tasks in box: ┌───┐ / │ tasks │ / └───┘. Show spinners for each parallel task. Replace with ✓ as each completes. Requires synchronized terminal output.

title: Update watch mode output symbols
description: In watch.zig: Use ◉ for 'watching' indicator (blue). Use ⟳ for 'changed' indicator (yellow). Format: '◉ watching src/**/*.zig' and '⟳ changed src/parser.zig'

title: Update dry-run output format
description: Use ▷ for dry-run mode header: '▷ dry-run (no commands executed)'. Use ○ symbol for pending tasks. Commands in dim/muted color. Summary: 'N tasks would run'

title: Update recipe list format
description: Add '{j} jake N recipes • M groups' header to jake -l. Remove [task]/[file] badges (too noisy). Keep bold group headers, Rose recipe names, muted descriptions. Add '... N more recipes (jake -la for all)' footer.
